website_summaries.verdict: Great amplifier for use in tough weather conditions, as it offers excellent protection against moisture problems.
pros: Small physical size of amplifier that allows you to use it for many uses, including boats, cars, and motorcycles
Offers adjustable crossovers, which isn't common in this price range
Delivers a peak power of 600 watts
cons: Could be subject to overheating problems if it doesn't have enough airflow around it

customer_reviews.title: 2017 Street Glide
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 2017 Street Glide. Fits right above the head unit on the stock shelf. If you are going to use this with your stock system you will need to use a line level converter and cut the stock wire harness. just know you should replace the stock speakers. with the proper set up this thing cranks! l should say that I am not using the stock heat unit or speakers. do the research and make sure you are ready for this. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: john warinner

customer_reviews.title: Great little amp for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Being unfamiliar with such a small amp, I made the mistake of ordering a 4 AWG install kit because that is all I have ever used. Well I was way off on this! After doing some research and calling KENWOOD (they had no idea and referred me to Crutchfield) I found it on the Crutchfield website. 10 AWG is sufficient for wiring this amp. The power/ground posts are so small you cant fit much bigger than 10AWG unless you had some special connectors to accommodate. I am very happy with this amp and would highly recommend it for the average stereo guy. It ain't gonna break windows or peg decibel meters but it sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: JLV

customer_reviews.title: Love it, Make sure all of the connections are ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, Make sure all of the connections are solid or it will over heat!!! Once done it makes the stereo on my street glide one heck of a great sounding system.. Plenty of power to push two 6-1/2" and two 6" x 9" speakers!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: small, good power, quiet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this KAC-M3004 4-channel amp to replace a 20 year old class A/B amp that developed a bad connection. I wanted something smaller than the old amp and this Class D amp is tiny. It gave me a lot more room underneath my seat. After I watched the youtube video by Dereck W. and saw the good price on Amazon, I was sold. This was my first class D amp and I can't hear any switching noise or junk. If you crank the gain controls way up, then you can hear the white noise, but with the gain at levels that matched my last amp, the hiss is barely audible with the vehicle off.
customer_reviews.author: Matt T.

customer_reviews.title: Fits anywhere, sounds great and doesn't get hot
customer_reviews.text: I installed two (2) of these behind the factory subwoofer trim panel of a 2016 Ford Edge (after removing the sub and fabbing up an amp rack) and they haven't overheated despite the 106 degree F weather we've been having here in Texas. I used them to power a set of Morel components (active) and Morel coaxials. One of the amplifiers is bridged down to 2 channels for the Morel woofers, the other drives the component tweeters and the rear coaxials. Bought these because I used to be a Kenwood fan but haven't used them in a long time. They still build some solid mobile audio gear and I wouldn't hesitate to buy these mini-amps again!
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Great Amp! Lots of control. Handling my tweeters and FR mids well
customer_reviews.text: Great little amp! Super compact and great for tight spaces. I purchased it not just because of the price but it had good control for a 4 channel amp. I was concerned how one would handle my tweeters and 4 full range door mids. I've had it now for a month and loving every bit of it. I ran my doors in series "rear" L/R and Tweeters straight off the amp "Front" L/R. With the help of my Kenwood Headunit, It sounds amazing. I recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: St.Jeezy

customer_reviews.title: Small size, big sound, recommended
customer_reviews.text: Small size, big impact, works fantastic. Fits easily up under the passenger side of 2010 corolla, factory settings of gain about midway is fine for a good start. I would not hesitate to purchase again. UPDATE: it's been about a month, no matter how hard I push it, it does not distort. I have had this running for a 2 hour road trip, constant, music cranked 80% (any louder would just hurt) and no overheating or problems. If you just want your music louder for yourself, not the cars around you, this is your no-brainer ticket.
customer_reviews.author: Roger T.

customer_reviews.title: The little amp that could.
customer_reviews.text: This amp in my opinion provides great power for the amount you pay for it. I configured it as two front speakers and a sub and all-round the sound is clear and powerful, not to mention the sub is just amazing. The amp can be tucked away out of sight in small places and that's a main benefit for those who want a great sounding system without sacrificing appearance. I would definitely recommend, it was not designed to be the loudest most powerful but it is just right for those who want something a bit more at an affordable price. Lastly installation was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: andrea medford

customer_reviews.title: great sound and flexibiity of install locations
customer_reviews.text: 1st amp I received that was supposed to new was actually used, and 1 channel didn't work at all. sent back and received a new one actually the second time. that worked out of the box and continues to this day. the sound and power is produces is amazing. I love its range and how the amp does make a difference you can hear. would recommend for anyone wanting to get more out of their stereo.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jiles

customer_reviews.title: Wire the amp correctly..with correct size wire..awgs..
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what the people are doing with the one star ratings I guess they are not wiring it wrong..you have to make shure you have a good ground with a at least 12 awg wire all of the wires are connected correctly ..negative with negative so on n so on..I’ve been using the amp on my Harley street glide for the past 6 months and it’s great for the money..I rode in the Florida heat in the summer and never once did it clip or over heat...a great amp
customer_reviews.author: Vic from Florida

customer_reviews.title: So little, so much power
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small amp to fit in a tight space to power a couple of 8" woofers. Having worked with car audio gear for nearly 30 years, I was very skeptical that something so small can put out a lot of power (and do so without burning up). I set it up in 2 channel bridged mode. Seems to work very well. Had I not installed the thing I'd never know it wasn't something larger. No thermal shutdowns. Good stuff. Connections and features are all nice and easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: DJRobX

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: The amp worked fine for awhile but now it cuts out at higher volumes. This happens in the morning after the amp has sat so I know it is not because it is hot. I only have the problem on channel A. I swapped the inputs and it still only happens on channel A. The amp is only 2 months old. What piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Central Texan

customer_reviews.title: Great little amp
customer_reviews.text: Great little amp. Sounds very nice. Happy with the size and sound. Apparently this is not an authorized dealer. It's a crapshoot but Amazon helps with any problems that may occur if you don't wait too long. Made in China. When Kenwood quit making their products in Japan they lost control of who sells their products. Too bad
customer_reviews.author: normscall

customer_reviews.title: This amp is a power house! 700W 4 channel D class!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2019 Roadglide and this little amp has my kickers 6x9 and 5.6 hitting hard. I turn the gain down because the amp has 700 watts not 600. You can see the dyno on YouTube. Also the amp is so small it barely takes up space in my saddle bag. Great amp for a great price. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: JUNESKI

customer_reviews.title: Great little amps
customer_reviews.text: I have two, one in my truck, one in my boat. Great little amps. Worth every penny if you run them correctly. Power is very good for the size. Run quality speakers that require matched power, and it will be loud and clear.
customer_reviews.author: bummers

customer_reviews.title: Great amp for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great amp for the boat! Using it with 4 kenwood speakers and it sounds much better then the stock install. Previously tried the slightly smaller compact kenwood amp but they seemed to be low quality and very noisy on the speaker outputs. Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Mark_LA

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and sound
customer_reviews.text: Mounted in 2008 Street Glide with a Kenwood KMR-312BT that was already in the bike. Pushes 4x 6x9's from Polk Audio with no issue. Used an oscilloscope to set max gain without distortion and it sounds great. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Winston Harrington

customer_reviews.title: KAC-M3004 Power House
customer_reviews.text: Well, all I can say is WOW!!! I've been in the car audio world since the mid 90's. I use to install custom car audio for a living and have seen a lot of changes. One change is that Kenwood has taken me by surprise with this little power house. I purchased this amp to change things up, on a custom install on my 2011 FLHX. The only thing I can say is wow and wish that amps where made this way when I was building car audio systems for a living. I hope that the build quality of this Kenwood amplifier is as good as it performs.
customer_reviews.author: snoboy

customer_reviews.title: It works as advertised and more.
customer_reviews.text: This Kenwood amp is awesome. It resides on my Indian Chieftain Dark Horse in one of my saddlebags hooked to 4 polk audio speaker and Rockville Sub . Very powerful for its compact size.
customer_reviews.author: arthur j brodeur

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this amp, used it to replace my monsterous t300.2 and the sound quality is close with the speakers I have. Amp does get pretty Warm but I have it running 2 channels at 3ohm and the rear bridged at 8. Needless to say it has never shut off and I recommend it to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Dirt101

customer_reviews.title: Compact, great quality, quick replacement.
customer_reviews.text: I put this amp in my 2009 Electra glide, fits well, easy install. Only negative is that the original amp didn’t work properly. It had no sound input, and after days of troubleshooting I narrowed it down to the amp. I requested a replacement, it came the next day. I hooked it up, and it works flawlessly. Very happy, great buy, super compact.
customer_reviews.author: cjn

customer_reviews.title: Save time and money
customer_reviews.text: Tested this amp for a few weeks now and it's running strong as advertised. I bought this amp for my 4 speakers and bought the Kenwood KAC-M3001 for my single sub. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucelle Phan

customer_reviews.title: Small, easy to install, and powerful for its size.
customer_reviews.text: Small, easy to install, and powerful for its size. Runs just warm even when I push the volume up, and it can easily heavy hitting music. The only thing I would have liked is an on-board way to bridge the 4 channels into 2; in order to bridge to a 2-channel output you have to use Y-adaptors to connect to all 4 RCA inputs, even if you're source is only 2-channel.
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install because of its small size. Easy instructions. Rated at 600 watts, I think it more than that. Great amp for price.
customer_reviews.author: rodney Horton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my factory JBL amp in my Toyota 4Runner. It's so much cleaner and louder. I couldn't be happier. I paired it with the m3001 to power my sub. I didn't want large amps under my seat, both of these amps fit right where my factory amp was. I highly recommend this series of micro amp because it's one of the few that has gain and crossover controls.
customer_reviews.author: Austin W.

customer_reviews.title: Good price if you have the necessary hardware
customer_reviews.text: Ended up sending this back since I would have had to purchase additional pieces just to wire this up to stock Harley wiring.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: compact size
customer_reviews.text: Small package which makes installing simple on deciding where to install yet it packs a great punch
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: Compact size with good power.
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my Harley-Davidson I get a lot more sound quality out of my speakers now.
customer_reviews.author: jcbigred

customer_reviews.title: An amp worth every cent!
customer_reviews.text: This little amp packs a solid punch and will certainly bring your car audio system to life. my 6x9 JBLs and 6.5 Rockfords have never sounded so clear and with no distortion even at high volume and I didn't even turn up the gain!
customer_reviews.author: Breadwinner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little amp
customer_reviews.text: Been running this little fella for about a month now in a 2000 Mazda Protege. Powering a pair of Kicker 9x6 150W RMS speakers. Amazing sound and power. Gets hot, but Kenwood told me this is normal for this class of amps. I mounted it under the back dash between the speakers. Sooo much better than taking up the entire trunk with a sub and amp.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Good amp that won’t break the bank
customer_reviews.text: I needed to pump up the tunes in my street rod so I could hear them over the rumble of the exhaust. This amp does the job and for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Old Cee

customer_reviews.title: BIG SOUND SMALL FOOTPRINT
customer_reviews.text: Installed this inside the fairing of my motorcycle and it is LOUD and clear. I bridged this amp to two Polk DB691 speakers and get compliments all of the time on how loud and clear the sound is. This amp is super small especially for the power that it puts out.
customer_reviews.author: Milton and Makeyvia

customer_reviews.title: ... and hooked 4 speakers to it it's a very nice amp seriously lowd haha What's nice about it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Installed this in my little boat and hooked 4 speakers to it it's a very nice amp seriously lowd haha What's nice about it is its very small so you can install it in places other amps couldn't. Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: bradly

customer_reviews.title: Nice small amp price good
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact amp if you have 4 speaker get 2 amps ! sounds good easy install
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great amp.
customer_reviews.text: This amp is very strong. Lots of power. Front channels run 6.5 visatons and dayton tweeter and rear is bridged to run 8 inch imagedymanics in a ported box. The sound quality is amazing from this amp and kenwood ddx dvd player.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss. You like roulette? That’s what you’re playing buying this.
customer_reviews.text: Worked maybe 10 trips on the lake now no output whatsoever. Powers on, but zero output.
customer_reviews.author: kj3284jhdfjh348hfd

customer_reviews.title: More sound!
customer_reviews.text: Added a good punch to the inside aftermarket component speakers I have. It's not MASSIVE but it keeps the clarity when you decide to go from half volume to 3/4 when on the freeway in a loud ass old fox body Mustang.
customer_reviews.author: Mustang Driver

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great with no distortion
customer_reviews.text: Powering a pair of infinity 5.25 components and a pair of infinity 5x8s. Sounds great with no distortion. Simple amp install. Easily fits under a 2004 Tacoma seat.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Finley

customer_reviews.title: unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: unbelievable its a little beast it doesn't seem to get too hot I can smell it breaking in I cant wait
customer_reviews.author: Charles Riccardo

customer_reviews.title: Works great good price
customer_reviews.text: Works great good price. The only problem I had was with the directions. I called KENWOOD customer service and the problem was solved. In the directions it does not tell you that you can use the automatic antenna wire to power the amp.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Hengler

customer_reviews.title: Great little amp .
customer_reviews.text: Great amp for the price , very compact In size and did a great job pushing 4 6.5 midrange 2 way speakers .
customer_reviews.author: george p

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed with the power of these little amps ...
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the power of these little amps. It fit in any space. I matched it with his mono brother in a ridiculous space.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product will definitely buy again this amp rocks it woke up my Polk audio speakers
customer_reviews.author: Theone

customer_reviews.title: Who ever said good things come in small packages was talking about this ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this VERY small, VERY underrated amp to power two Polk 6x9s on my motorcycle... WOW! Who ever said good things come in small packages was talking about this amp.
customer_reviews.author: p-bar

customer_reviews.title: Works great and is small.
customer_reviews.text: Great little 4 channel amp for the price. It does get warm but haven't been able to get it really hot or have it shutdown. It's nice to have the built in high and low pass filters in such a low priced amp.
customer_reviews.author: MODist

customer_reviews.title: Mighty Compact!
customer_reviews.text: First I like to say it is a formidable little amp. It's compact, but yet powerful. It is driven by Alpine PXA H-800 sound processor with the old school JVC KS-DR3001D DRVN Mono amp powering JL Audio 8w3v2 sub. Clean output!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Great amp
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast and is a great amp. Puts out more power than advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smelled of smoke, quit working after a month.
customer_reviews.text: Everything was wired up properly. Sent it to the Kenwood under warranty, but USPS lost it! Ordered another and will write a proper review in a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great amp!
customer_reviews.text: This little powerhouse has never let me down in the 18 months that I've owned it. I've hidden it away for the stealth look on a 2016 Honda Fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Y

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great amp to be so small, easy to adjust and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Devon L. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: Popped and garbled loudly when turning on...that's a deal killer
customer_reviews.author: Scott K

customer_reviews.title: Great little power house!
customer_reviews.text: Great little amp ugraded from kicker 200.2 (for slightly lower price)! Great power improvement even with the gain turned down. with little space on my honda vfr 1200 this amp fit under the seat. I also upgraded the 4in kicker ds series to the jl gto 429 4in speaker this is much louder and clearer.
customer_reviews.author: T. Heredia

customer_reviews.title: Used amp, sold for new
customer_reviews.text: Charged me 200bucks for the same amp I got for 130 a month ago. And the wiring harness was chopped in half. I paid more for a used amp🤦‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: JoJo K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Jeep TJ
customer_reviews.text: Mounted under dash below steering column fits perfect and great power.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Used this amp to power four hull speakers in my boat. works excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy D.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, versatile, and yet very small
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, versatile, and yet very small. It is powering 7 speakers (4 - 5.25 and 3 – 3.5). I installed it under the dashboard on the passenger side of a Mazda CX-5.
customer_reviews.author: Adolfo Pons N

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working a few months later
customer_reviews.text: Amp stopped working a few months after install. Initially channel A stopped working and a few weeks later, channel B stopped working. Amp powers on, but emits no sound. Don't buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: We had a small space to install 2 Amps (Kenwood KAC-M3004, KAC-M3001) and it worked out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Small but does the job
customer_reviews.text: Great little amp , plays all day in my boat !
customer_reviews.author: Freddie Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Very compact, easy to adjust, works very well in a boat. The only downside to it is the need for crimp connections on all the speakers.
customer_reviews.author: S. Belanger

customer_reviews.title: Kenwood amp
customer_reviews.text: This amp went on my husband's Harley. He loves it. Says it sounds better then other amps. He will be buying more for his car
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lacks power and sharp bass.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected and sounds small too. Lacking the power and “umph” that one expects from a 400w amplifier.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful and very reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great and fits in very small spaces. Plenty of power for my 4 6 1/2” JBl’s.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Dadds

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and very compact, fits under the front seats.
customer_reviews.author: my experience

customer_reviews.title: Perfect amp when you don't want to sacrifice a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect amp when you don't want to sacrifice a lot of space. I don't even have much room under my seats so this was a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Harley Road Glide
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Harley. Powering 2 6x9s and 2 8s.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User.

customer_reviews.title: Bad product, good service.
customer_reviews.text: Sounded great and easy to install, but stopped working shortly after putting it in. Seller handled it very well, though.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: and must for door speakers
customer_reviews.text: made my door speakers come alive!! was running 265 watt 55 rms from the deck, i felt like i wasnt getting the sound i paid for, installed this and my speakers woke up!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made product.
customer_reviews.text: This amp is serious, got only 2 speakers on my bike sounding so Good, I will order again and it's very compact with a nice kick.
customer_reviews.author: Alfuquan C.

customer_reviews.title: Kenwood Kac M3004 Motorcycle Amp
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Kenwood Kac m3004 to install on my '18 Vaquero. The install went quite well. Excellent power for such a small footprint and easy to tune.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: produces great sound output for my speakers
customer_reviews.text: Simple slim design makes installation a breeze, produces great sound output for my speakers, easy to wire up and overall a great product. Don't let the size fool you, this amp has some punch!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and easy to locate in your vehicle, you will not regret your purchase
customer_reviews.author: Terry Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for lower wattage speakers in smaller vehicles
customer_reviews.text: Very compact amp. Nice for lower wattage speakers in smaller vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie L

customer_reviews.title: Hope for the Jeep JK Wrangler audio!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Installed it to my '15 Wrangler Rubicon (w/ 730N/RHR Nav.) I also have the Mopar 77KCK053. After installing Mopar 77KCK053, I found out that the rear speakers have "REDUCED" output compared to the fronts. This cannot be fixed or adjusted on the Mopar/Kicker amp. This Kenwood KAC-M3004 amp has similar specification to the Mopar/Kicker Amp. I made my own harness using Metra radio and reverse wire harness. I did have to tap into the rear speaker out from the radio the get the 'un-filtered' signal. Now I maintained all factory functions. (Uconnect, Steering wheel control, front/rear/left/right fader control.) I also made a bracket to piggy-back on to the Mopar/Kicker amp. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Pumpkin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little amp runs 4 6x9 speakers perfectly. Amazing sound
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Used for a stealth install on a classic car and am very happy.
customer_reviews.text: This amp is loud and clear for its size. Used for a stealth install on a classic car and am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jarvis Keller

customer_reviews.title: Decent. But broke
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was excellent. Only lasted a mouth before it literally caught on fire. Would recommend for dry environment only.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this for his motorcycle and loves it!

customer_reviews.title: The real deal, true RMS watts
customer_reviews.text: Love it, its small and packs a punch, real power, no BS here
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Compact and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Worked great hidden behind my dash, great sound quality and volume level.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Added a ton of punch and sound to my stereo install
customer_reviews.text: Big sound from a little package. Stealth mount under the passenger seat, so its very small size was appreciated. 50w RMS power to each speaker is perfect for most moderate aftermarket speakers to drive them without blowing them up, or needing to run heavy and expensive new wiring.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Ellazar

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product, after a few weeks it stopped working
customer_reviews.author: chico

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great Amp for the $$$. I’ll be buying another one soon

customer_reviews.title: Great compact amp
customer_reviews.text: Great amp but its a little more money than other amps with true power
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and plenty of power to drive my ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and plenty of power to drive my 10" sub and two 8" 2-way speakers. Love the size. Needed to hide/tuck away in an older jeep and it fit behind dash nicely.
customer_reviews.author: guest 1

customer_reviews.title: Amp works great. I watched a video that says they are ...
customer_reviews.text: Amp works great. I watched a video that says they are underpowered. I purchased and installed. Has nice clear sound.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Lara

customer_reviews.title: I can hear tunes on my Harley!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Amp! Fit perfect in the fairing of my 04 Electraglide mounted right on top of the receiver! Works and sounds great!
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: No power then read here.
customer_reviews.text: First off I'd like to say that if you are having problems powering it on when used without a head unit you must connect the battery terminal on the amp to the p. con (power control terminal) on the amp. Unless I didn't see it on the instructions it doesn't say it anywhere. Otherwise your amp won't power up. I put this on my boat and am just running a blue tooth dongle as a source input. The amp is WAY better than the Pyle marine amp I have had for the last couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A. Nelms

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent amplifier, I love the dual LPF, Full, HPL for both A and B controls
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy install, used in a Regal 2200 to power ...
customer_reviews.text: Small in size but packs a huge punch. Simple and easy install, used in a Regal 2200 to power 4 speakers - great quality sound with more than enough power. Love the compact look, takes up little to no spacing. Its lightweight so it can be placed just about anywhere. Extremely happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: S S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent!!! Could not be happier. Very compact, and excellent sound quality... Installed on a 2015 nissan murano with an android head unit...
customer_reviews.author: checksum

customer_reviews.title: Happy so far
customer_reviews.text: I like this little amp. Don't expect to blow the doors off but it works for my motorcycle pushing two 4" and two 6" speakers. I'm running a Kenwood marine radio with polk audio speakers and they sound great.
customer_reviews.author: marknett

customer_reviews.title: Great gift and quality gift.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son for his car. The unit comes with all information to be installed. However, you will need to purchase a kit if you have a stock amp or stereo currently installed. My son did a lot of research and installed it himself. Very proud to see him do it!
customer_reviews.author: Rolando Calderon

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality amp in a compact package
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality amp in a compact package. No noise and easy to install. Only minor negatives are the power terminals are very small and the gain pots a little difficult to engage since they are recessed and hard to see.
customer_reviews.author: Firelock

customer_reviews.title: It jams
customer_reviews.text: It jams in our pontoon. easy install and its very compact. put one in my RZR too. So far its been wet and muddy no issues yet
customer_reviews.author: The Jackal

customer_reviews.title: good amp
customer_reviews.text: easy to install good size just doesn't have the boost I was expecting. I will say it is very adjustable for sound control just lacks some noticeable boost.
customer_reviews.author: john hill

customer_reviews.title: Very compact
customer_reviews.text: Great power, and great small size! Had trouble wiring could've been on my side. And can't seem to get the 4 speakers to all play at the same level.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden Lipsey

customer_reviews.title: Good work on this product.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good after a couple was sent back.
customer_reviews.author: VR

customer_reviews.title: Ho hum - not enough extra power over stock amp
customer_reviews.text: Not much better than stock amp in my Fiat 500. Doesn't seem to put out the advertised power.
customer_reviews.author: tandemnut

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product. Only have to have half as much volume. Clear and Loud.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Davenport

product_meta.title: Kenwood KAC-M3004 Compact 4 Channel Digital Amplifier
product_meta.description: Many of today's power sports have very limited space to work in and tend to be a harsh environment for electronics because of the exposure to outdoor environments. Kenwood's compact performance amplifiers are small in size so they fit even the most limited installation areas. The amplifiers also use a conformal coated main pcb (printed circuit boards) which offer extra layers of protection to help prevent moisture or damp air from damaging the product. - Rms power output 2o: 75w x 4 - perfect for boats, atv's, motorcycles, cars and more - dimensions(wxhxd): 6-1/2" x 1-3/4" x 3-7/8".

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars258 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
